page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I am Maria Bell at 7.00am.I wash,dress, make my bed,make mum a coffee, have my Frosties and do my hair. I go to school on the bus with my trumpet. In class we say prayers,do S.M.P.,maths and games. I go for my trumpet lesson. After school I play out until teatime then I change for guides. I am working on my badges. I go home for my bath and go to bed. I am Andrew Ryan I get up, dress, have breakfast and do my piano practice. I walk to school with my swimming kit and my guitar. At 9.00am. we go swimming at the Garstang pool. After break we do S.M.P. maths. At dinner time I go to guitar class. After dinner we watch T.V., do Religious Education until 3.25pm. At .30pm. I go to my piano lesson. I go to bed at 8.30pm.
